Description:
STUNNING BRAND NEW RESIDENCE!
This architecturally designed residence showcases a functional modern floorplan and is
perfectly situated in close proximity to amenities including medical centre's, supermarkets, specialty shops, restaurants and cafes. This fabulous unit has been individually designed with a strong focus on privacy, aesthetic appeal and low maintenance living for those looking to make the most of their lifestyle without compromising on creature comforts and include quality fixtures and finishes throughout plus ducted heating. With abundant storage, secure car accommodation and featuring a brilliantly spacious open plan kitchen and living area flowing out to a sunny expansive deck, this really is a fantastic opportunity for owner occupiers and investors alike! Don't miss your opportunity to secure your future on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula with award winning wineries and stunning beaches all on your doorstep. Call today to book your inspection!

Description:
An Exceptional and Rare Block of Land in Central Drysdale
ON The Market
An outstanding opportunity presents itself to build in the heart of the ever so charming Drysdale. Located just off High Street this rare and well connected location has it all! Within easy reach to everything - the town centre, schools, cafés, walking tracks, medical facilities.... the list goes on! With all you could want and need so close, you can leave the car at home.
With the land due for titling due by the end of July 2020, now is the perfect time to get your plans ready to bring your dream home to life! It is an ideal time to take advantage of the $25,000 Government incentive under the new Job Builder scheme. And for first home buyers it is even more attractive with the potential to get up to $45,000 in grants and stamp duty savings. Amazing!
Is this idyllic location you will love being surrounded by the already established homes and enjoy the lifestyle benefits of living on the beautiful Bellarine! Secure this approximately 495m2 piece of land and begin your property building journey today!
The Bellarine peninsula is renowned for the blissful, outdoor lifestyle. Central to bay side beaches, local wineries, and great fishing spots. The Port Phillip Ferry sails daily from Portarlington and South Bank if you fancy a day trip to the city. Combine this with the new Drysdale bypass to improve ease of commuting from the Bellarine, and creating countless benefits to locals and visitors.
This will fly!!! Don't you be the one to miss out..
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!

Description:
PRIVATE HAVEN, LOW MAINTENANCE AND BIG WORKSHOP!
Diligently maintained over the years with nothing to do but enjoy the lifestyle on the Bellarine. Generous entrance, formal lounge and a fabulous second room with dining , living and large kitchen, both living rooms have doors opening to entertaining area framed with colour from the matured private gardens, just beautiful. Three bedrooms, extra generous main with ensuite and WIR, others have BIR'S, study, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features central heating, evaporative cooling, timber flooring, extra insulation for soundproofing, quality furnishings and fittings, dishwasher, and more to entice the astute buyer. Double garage with internal access, HUGE WORKSHOP a real bonus , trades people NOTE. Position is great ,walk to schools, golf club, the jetty and the Dell. Wow see you soon!

Description:
RENOVATED ! BAY VIEWS ! SOLAR AND ROOM FOR THE BOAT!
This home has been well maintained and it shows. The lounge room is light and bright, extra sitting area or formal dining, second flexible space has a fabulous new kitchen with so much storage and plenty of space for meals and living, doors open to undercover patio. Three bedrooms, main with full dressing room and ensuite, other two have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Features include two split systems, fans, solar panels, new flooring, window furnishings, dishwasher, Westinghouse 900 SSS oven, security blinds and so much storage.
Double carport, space for the boat/caravan, two sheds and such a well cared for garden.
The court position is private and close to the bay with walking tracks for leisure, take the boat out on the bay for the day. The living is easy here at no 15 Taronga Court.

Description:
"JUST LOVE MY HOME AND STUDIO "
Central position, stroll to the village centre, coffee, shop, walk and enjoy all the parklands. Absolutely nothing to do, just perfect ! The spacious living room is light and bright, has adjacent kitchen with doors opening to a sunroom area/library, all overlooking the garden haven, vibrant colours and produce. Two queen bedrooms with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and powder room. Features include shutters, walk in pantry, dishwasher, split system, bosch wall oven, fans, three watertanks, two sheds (big and small) plus manufactured timber flooring. Carport behind secure gates with plenty of room for more standing in driveway off road. The freestanding studio allows for flexible use... third bedroom, work room or home office. Take the time to view all that is here, downsize with ease, great first time buy or astute investment opportunity.

Description:
3.5 acres of Bliss on the Bellarine
Set upon approx. 3.5 acres, this property offers sensational family living in an idyllic rural setting! Showcasing beautifully updated interiors, a spacious outdoor entertaining zone with spa, and an expansive 5-car work shed, every inch of this property will delight!
Rarely do you get to experience the perks of rural living, while still being close to lifes conveniences. A short drive will find you at Lake Connewarre or in the bustling hub of Leopold, which is home to the Gateway Plaza and Leopold P.S. A selection of the finest wineries are virtually on your doorstep, as well as the popular Flying Brick Cider Co. The Bellarine Highway grants easy access to Adventure Park and the scenic Bellarine Peninsula.
With recent updates including freshly painted interiors and new carpet, plus a brand new en suite to the Master Bedroom, youll love that you can move straight in without having to lift a finger. Complete with built-in cabinetry, the lounge provides a generous retreat for relaxation. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone features a wall of north-facing windows, which maximises the natural light and captures the surrounding gardens. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). Entertainers will be in their element when they lay eyes on the outdoor entertaining zone. The sheltered deck creates a wealth of space for hosting loved ones, while the sun-drenched spa zone is an absolute treat!
Parents will adore the Master Bedroom, which features two walk-in robes and a new en suite. Boasting an open shower and dual vanity with clean-lined cabinetry, this en suite exudes sleek and contemporary style. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and separate toilet, while the study offers versatility as a 4th Bedroom. The laundry boasts ample storage. Ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans provide comfort.
The expansive grounds create a private wonderland for children and adults alike. Nestled amongst the gums, the rustic fire pit area is perfect for chilly winter nights. The double lock-up garage provides secure parking, while the work shed accommodates five vehicles and the additional workshop measures 3.5 x 5.4m making this property an ideal choice for tradies and hobby farmers. A powered concrete slab offers dedicated parking for a caravan.
With something to impress every family member, youll need to act swiftly to secure this rare lifestyle opportunity! Inspect ASAP!

Description:
Titled Land with Stunning Bay Views
The Feel:
The best land in Clifton Springs was snapped up and built on long ago with the exception of this large vacant lot in one of the townships best streets! A wide frontage and sweeping bay views are here and ready to support your dream coastal home.
The Facts:
- 665sqm approx. of sought-after vacant land to build your dream home (STCA)
- Neighbouring established homes have some of the best bay views in the area
- Wide 18.2m (approx) frontage permits great rear yard access for vehicles
- Arguably the best orientation with north-facing rear aspect
- Comfortable walk to Drysdales shops, cafes and primary school
- Peacefully quiet neighbourhood with parkland 50m away
Owner Loves....
Weve always loved the streetscape of Panoramic Terrace. Theres some really premium homes who benefit from incredible north-facing views of the bay from Geelong to Melbourne

Description:
Large, Packed with features and what a view!
Sitting on 620m2 this impressive 2 Storey 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with study, 3 living zones and DLUG has everything the large or growing family would need and more. Approximately 8.5 years old it sits high on the hill in Leopold and enjoys panoramic views looking west from Corio Bay to Torquay. Built by Metricon it has been designed with space and comfort in mind. The layout has a porcelain tile floor entrance foyer. To the left is the first living space. To the right is the access to the 2 car garage which is plumbed. Moving further into the home is the powder room and laundry. Beyond this is the 2nd living space on the right and further on the open plan living, dining and kitchen. The kitchen really is unusually well equipped with the 900ml cooktop in the island bench which is great when entertaining and cooking. This is complimented by 2 ovens - an 80ltr pyrolytic and a dual purpose steam oven. This is in addition to a convection microwave. A large butler's pantry with sink and plenty of cupboard and bench space complete this serious cook's kitchen. Upstairs is another living space and balcony with amazing views and potentially a study nook. All the bedrooms are upstairs with the master at the front of the home also with its own balcony. The ensuite features an oversized shower recess, twin vanities with stone benches and a separate toilet. Twin double door wardrobes feature hanging and drawer space. The remaining bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by a central bathroom with spa. Climate control throughout the home is via split system aircon and ceiling fans. Outside has a low maintenance garden at the front, a pebble mix pathway at the side and gazebo and entertainment deck at the rear with terraced lawn space. This really is an amazing package loaded with features and benefits. With the stakes in Leopold rising and rising this one is worth a closer look!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Ideal Downsizer, first home or investment!
Sitting on 419m2 this 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with SLUG would make an ideal downsizer, first home or investment returning $380 /week. With an easy living layout it features a central hub with an open plan kitchen dining and lounge. Neutral tones throughout allow for any taste in décor. The kitchen has 600ml SS gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher. With tiles in the kitchen and dining and carpet in the lounge it makes for a practical and comfortable setting. The main bedroom with ensuite is at the front of the home while the remaining bedrooms are located to the east side and rear of the home. Sitting on 419m2 Outside is a blank slate. Currently lightly grassed with a concrete pad it is ready for the new owner to put their stamp on the property with landscaping and potentially an undercover area. This property represents outstanding value in Leopold a suburb that continues provide home owners with amazing capital growth. You'll need to be quick to snare this one!

Description:
A RARE OPPORTUNITY BUILT FOR COMFORT ON OWN TITLE!!
On its own title, this impressive 2-bedroom, 1 bath, 1 living room, brick unit set on 277m2 boasts its own frontage and a double lock up garage! Close to public transport and 3 minutes' drive to the local shopping center this beautifully presented and well cared for unit would suit first home buyers, downsizers and investors alike with a potential rent of $325 per week Comprising of a neat entry into the generous sized living area, double block out blinds, Led downlights, Vulcan gas wall furnace, ceiling fan and Mitsubishi split system heating and cooling for your comfort. The fantastic light filled kitchen/meals area seating up to 6 features an inbuilt sky light, great cupboard space and a Simpson oven with4 burner Gas cooktop and rangehood.
Off the living room you will find a hall with 2 great sized bedrooms, both with block out blinds, built in wardrobes and ceiling fans. The nicely tiled central bathroom features a good-sized bath, corner shower, heat lights and a separate toilet. A sliding door off the meals area gives you access out into the neat rear courtyard equipped with pergola and perfect for getting some sun or pottering around in the low maintenance garden which sprawls right around unit. A great sized double lock up, remote garage with internal access into the huge laundry which has ample storage space. An additional safety feature of the home is the camera security system installed. Located with easy access to public transport, close to primary and secondary schools, shopping centers at Newcomb Central + Bellarine Village, Splashdown aquatic center, sporting facilities and only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and waterfront. Stylish and Built for convenience, security and comfort, there is nothing left to do except move in!
FEATURES
• 277m2 block on its own title (No Body Corp fees or shared driveway)
• Mitsubishi split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans in each room.
• Vulcan wall furnace
• Rent per week $325 (approx)
• Double lock up garage with internal access

Description:
All Investors Stop Here!
With a great tenant in place and a lease signed to May 2021 - add this one too your portfolio today. Large 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom & 2 living ready for your finishing touches. Step down to the sizeable lounge with a reverse cycle split system. Master bedroom has pocket bay views, walk in robe & full en-suite. Vast open plan kitchen & dining area is tiled with a ceiling fan & sliding out to undercover alfresco. Kitchen has stainless steel wall oven; 5 burner gas cook top & plenty of cupboards. Large 2nd living is light filled with views of the backyard, a gas heater & sliding door again to the pergola. Down the hall are bigger than average bedrooms that both have vertical blinds & built in robes. Central bathroom & toilet. Out the back is a storage/workshop, garden shed & plenty of yard for kids & pets to play. Tandem 2 car carport behind roller doors for secure parking. This awaits you on a great 604m2 block. Close to local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport, medical facilities & everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
SEE THE POSSIBILITIES !
Choosing to relocate to the beautiful Bellarine will be a choice that you will never regret. Stunning northerly views of the undulating countryside and the glistening waters of Corio Bay.
Immaculately maintained and presented this three bedroom, two bathroom plus study home is located in a quiet street in the central area of Drysdale/Clifton Springs. Perfectly positioned amongst quality, modern homes - this is truly a lifestlye change !
Classy neutral palette, new floor coverings, solid timber floors, quality fixtures & fittings, intercom system, gas central heating, SSDW, walkin pantry, remote to garage and low maintenance gardens. Perfect !

Description:
The family home with it all
Plenty of space for the whole family and all of your friends makes this one property you don't want to miss in Drysdale's beautiful Central Walk.
Spread out across THREE whole living areas; a lounge at the rear of the property, east facing sitting room and grand open plan kitchen, dining and living area so no matter what, everyone can watch their favourite programs in peace.
Open plan kitchen, dining, lounge is sure to impress. Kitchen full to the guts with 900mm five burner gas cooktop, stainless steel wall oven, dishwasher and plenty of drawer and pantry space.
If outdoor entertaining is your life, you'll love this too; the entire outdoor of the home is undercover so you can have your pool table and barbecues set up year round for all of your friends to come around and enjoy no matter the weather, don't forget the steam sauna either!
The master bedroom features views onto the fully landscaped garden and an enormous walk-through robe and ensuite to match. The fully-optioned ensuite is closer to being it's own full bathroom with extra large shower, double vanity and toilet.
Second, third and fourth bedrooms all have built-in robes and will fit anywhere from a single to king size bed.
Extra large 6m by 7m garage with drive through access means you won't bang your car doors and you've got plenty of room for storing that camping gear or the boat.
Additional features include refrigerated air conditioning and ducted heating, Ethernet connections in most rooms, alarm system, CrimSafe security door, plantation blinds in each room and flood lights in the backyard all on a 537sqm block.

Description:
Beautiful family home in quiet pocket of Leopold.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Set on a generous 563m2 in the ever-popular estuary estate, this beautiful family home is sure to appeal to those that are searching for space, peace, and privacy. Comprising 4 very generous bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 separate living areas, and a sunny backyard, this could be the perfect first home or even investment property.
On entry is a large living room, which flows through to the light-filled kitchen, living, and family room. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, stone benches, and quality cabinetry throughout.
The main living area opens out to a secure backyard, which offers low-maintenance gardens and direct gated access to the front via the side pedestrian gate; perfect for those with kids and pets.
Accommodation is made up of a large main bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite at the front of the home, and 3 bedrooms to the rear of the home; 2 with built-in robes.
Noteworthy features include:
- Split system air-conditioning in both living areas
- Gas Ducted Heating
- 4 Camera Security System
- Double Garage with remote
- 5 years old built by Hamlan Homes
Located within walking distance local parks, BBQ areas and playgrounds and Estuary Reserve, just 3 minutes' drive to the Gateway Plaza, as well as being about 20 minutes' drive from Geelong and the Surf Coast, there is a lot to like about this neat package!
Insights: First listed on 23 September, this house has been on Domain for 27 days (last updated on 6 September). It was last sold in 2015 and 94 other 4 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious family home in a serene pocket.
Situated on 910m2, in a blue-chip Leopold location, this spacious family home offers so much to the growing family. Comprising 4 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, formal and informal living, and a stunning and private backyard, this property is sure to suit a vast array of savvy buyers.
On entry, a large formal living and dining room is a great space that can be utilised as intended or even be converted into a home office or rumpus room.
The kitchen features quality blackwood cabinetry, 900mm gas cooktop with glass splashbacks, dual drawer dishwasher, a 'one and a half' oven and plentiful storage throughout. The kitchen overlooks the open plan living area which opens seamlessly to a large undercover entertainment deck with feature lighting and tranquil surrounds.
Accommodation is well-appointed and features a large main bedroom with a large walk-in robe with built-in cabinetry, updated ensuite, ceiling fan, and an a/c unit for year-round comfort. 3 more bedrooms are situated to the rear of the home and all offer large built-in robes. Bedroom 4 is currently being utilised as a home office and has been fitted with downlights for better lighting. The large central bathroom features a modern floating vanity, large shower, bath, and a separate toilet.
Outside, the stunning backyard is flooding with year-round greenery, is private and secure for those with young children and pets and offers plenty of space for a pool (STCA).
The oversized double garage features high ceilings and doors, sturdy overhead storage shelves, enough space for a workshop and 2 cars, as well as the possibility to extend the roller doors to accommodate a large boat or caravan if need be. Adjacent the garage is a double carport with power and lighting, and undercover access to the home.
Notable features include:
- Split system air conditioning in the main living.
- Central heating throughout.
- L.E.D lighting throughout.
- Large laundry.
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and living areas.
- Roller shutters in 3 bedrooms.
- Ducted Vacuum.
- Irrigation system from laundry to garden.
- Under house storage.
This exceptional property is located within 5 minutes of Leopold's Gateway Plaza, just 15 minutes to the Geelong Waterfront, 10 minutes to the Bellarine Peninsula, and with easy access to some of Geelong's finest schools, this feature-packed property showcases the superior blend of convenience, practicality, and quality, in one of Geelong's most popular suburbs. Enquire today!
To book your private inspection please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.

Address: 97 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Residential Haven on 852m2!
Looking for a larger block that gives multiple options for outdoor living ?
Here is an immaculately maintained 852m2 to play with. First impressions wow you with a series of garden rooms whether it's the flower garden, the vegetable garden, the parent's sitting area or the kid's play yard it's all here in one package. Room to build a shed with dual access on this corner block or just let the chooks roam around - blocks this size are as scarce as hen's teeth!
This mid 90s home consists of four bedrooms - main with WIR, ensuite and its own courtyard - three minor bedrooms all with BIRs. The 4th bedroom is currently used as a study.
Light and spacious main living includes a 3 metre screen and projector, solid fuel heater and wood stacker, doors that open to a garden deck surrounded by manicured gardens. The dining room has access to a north facing garden full of productive vegetable beds and fruit trees. Inside the hub of the home has granite benchtops, ceramic cooktop, SSDW and complete with Butlers pantry.
If you are up for entertaining the rumpus room is ready for those long awaited get-togethers. On those warm Spring days throw open the double doors to spill out onto the extended deck areas. This home and larger land component is not to be missed !

Description:
916m2 Allotment, Residential Growth Zone Schedule 2
Attention all developers and investors, a myriad of opportunity awaits the astute purchaser of this property walking distance to Leopold Primary and Gateway Plaza! Subject to council approval, the owner has four concept plans prepared which show potential to either:
1. Keep the house and build 1 or 2 townhouses at the rear
2. Clear the site for townhouse development (2-4 townhouses)
The purpose of a residential growth zone, which this property is in, is to provide housing at increased densities. To encourage a diversity of housing types in locations offering good access to services and transport including activity centres and town centres. That's what makes this property real estate gold! Make no mistake, this property offers a solid home, a large 916m2 (approx.) allotment, excellent access to amenities and a prized Residential Growth Zone (Schedule 2)
Call now for further information!
